 2024-03252024-04-12INFC, CMHC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditors and Joint Auditor of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
PrecisOrder appointing ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario as AUDITOR of CANADA MORTGAGE HOUSING CORPORATION for the year 2024; and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of CANADA MORTGAGE AND HOUSING CORPORATION for the year 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order appointing ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario as AUDITOR of CANADA MORTGAGE HOUSING CORPORATION for the year 2024; and the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of CANADA MORTGAGE AND HOUSING CORPORATION for the year 2024.
